class.name: AnyMatrix

javadoc.text: Interface defining very basic matrix operations.

javadoc.return: true if the matrix is square (rowDimension = columnDimension)

javadoc.text: Returns the number of rows in the matrix.
Returns the number of columns in the matrix.
